title: 3 Ways to Get a Student Discount on Your Max Subscription

steps.title: Go to https://www.max.com/student.
steps.content: Go to https://www.max.com/student . Students can subscribe to Max's plan with ads for $4.99 per month, which is 50% off the normal price of $9.99 per month. This discount can only be used for up to 12 months. After 12 months (or if your student status changes during those 12 months) you'll have to pay $9.99 per month for the same Max plan. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Get the deal.
steps.content: Click Get the deal . It's a cyan blue button in the middle of the screen.

steps.title: Sign up for a free UNiDAYS account, or log in.
steps.content: Sign up for a free UNiDAYS account, or log in. If you're already signed up for UNiDAYS, log in now. Otherwise, sign up using these steps: Click the three-line menu in the upper-left corner. Click Join now . Enter your personal (not student) email and choose a password, agree to the UNiDAYS terms of service, and click Join now . Verify your account by entering your first and last name, gender, date of birth, school, and email when prompted. Click the link in the verification email sent to your student email to finish the verification process.

steps.title: Click Activate discount.
steps.content: Click Activate discount . You will be brought to the Max website to redeem your code.

steps.title: Click Agree & Continue.
steps.content: Click Agree & Continue . If you already have a Max account, you can sign in now. Otherwise, fill out the registration form and click Create Account .

steps.title: Choose a payment method.
steps.content: Choose a payment method. You can use a credit card, debit card, or PayPal account. Once you've paid, you will be subscribed to Max for $4.99 per month for 12 months. If you already have an active Max subscription, you may not need to enter your payment details.

steps.title: Go to https://www.myunidays.com.
steps.content: Go to https://www.myunidays.com . UNiDAYS is a website that has exclusive deals for verified university students. Note: UNiDAYS is the student status verification service that Max currently uses. If Max ever stops offering a student discount through their website, you might still be able to find a Max discount on UNiDAYS.

steps.title: Sign up for a free UNiDAYS account, or log in.
steps.content: Sign up for a free UNiDAYS account, or log in. If you're already signed up for UNiDAYS, log in now. Otherwise, sign up using these steps: Click the three-line menu in the upper-left corner. Click Join now . Enter your personal (not student) email and choose a password, agree to the UNiDAYS terms of service, and click Join now . Verify your account by entering your first and last name, gender, date of birth, school, and email when prompted. Click the link in the verification email sent to your student email to finish the verification process.

steps.title: Search for Max.
steps.content: Search for Max . If there are any deals, they will drop down from the search bar.

steps.title: Click Get now under the deal you want to claim.
steps.content: Click Get now under the deal you want to claim. The deal's webpage will go into detail about the terms of the deal, such as if this deal applies to new and/or existing customers.

steps.title: Click Activate discount.
steps.content: Click Activate discount . If the discount is automatic, you'll be brought to the Max website to sign up or log in to your Max account. If the discount is a code, you will be provided a code to use when signing up for Max.

steps.title: Go to https://www.studentbeans.com.
steps.content: Go to https://www.studentbeans.com . Like UNiDAYS, Student Beans is a website with exclusive deals for verified university students.

steps.title: Sign up for a free Student Beans account, or log in.
steps.content: Sign up for a free Student Beans account, or log in. If you're already signed up for Student Beans, log in now. Otherwise, sign up using these steps: Click Register in the upper-right corner. Enter your personal email (not your student one) and desired password and click Lets go! Enter your first and last name, pronouns, and birthdate, then click Continue . Set your email preferences. Enter the country your school is in, projected graduation date, and student email, then click Continue . If you don't have a student email, click Use a different method , then Upload proof . You'll need to upload an official document from your school to verify that you're a student. Click the link in the verification email sent to your student email to finish the verification process.

steps.title: Search for Max and click the offer you want to claim.
steps.content: Search for Max and click the offer you want to claim. The deal's webpage will go into detail about the terms of the deal, such as if this deal applies to new and/or existing customers. Student Beans doesn't always have Max offers, so if you don't see any, check back at a later time. As of October 2024, Student Beans has an offer for 20% off of 12 months of Max membership.

steps.title: Click Sign up now.
steps.content: Click Sign up now . If the discount is automatic, you'll be brought to the Max website to sign up for a new subscription or log in. If the discount is a code, you will be provided a code to use when signing up for Max.
